#calculate standard deviations of the expression of each gene in MCF10A
```{r}


df1 <- read.csv("231_expressed_openchromatin_6783.csv")
#Create data table with only normalized data for MCF10a
df <- df1[,c(3,21:24)]

df$SD<- apply(df[,-1], 1, sd)
df$mean <- df1$MCF10A.mean
df1$sd_mcf10a <- df$SD

df1$zscore <- (df1$MDA_MB.231.mean-df1$MCF10A.mean)/df1$sd_mcf10a

# write.csv(df1, "231_expressed_openchromatin_zscore_6783.csv", row.names=FALSE)
write.table(df1, '231_expressed_openchromatin_zscore_6783.txt' ,row.names=FALSE,sep="\t")

```
